item.title: Basic Machine Learning - Regression (Part 1)
item.description: Hello World! This is the first blog in a series of blogs on machine learning techniques. Machine Learning is the new cool buzzword and for good reason. The impact is immense and to the untrained eye; it is magic. But with this series of blogs, hopefully you’ll cross over to the other side and be the one doing all the magic stuff! First cool word - Regression Alright, so we begin our journey in this rabbit hole called Machine Learning (ML) with something simple yet powerful, a technique called Regression.
